channel.title: Project-Heartloss - A legend in the making
channel.description:
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/jztdp4.jpg[/img]
Hello yes if you saw my Project-Fame or played the beta then this is the same source, except it's remastered. Fixed Several Commands and added some zones, But this project is far from over I need 2 more coders to help finish it, the server is done but I want some coders who can make a webclient, custom minigames, and other extras. This project still takes on the base of Project-Fame's concept, old rsps style. the newest item is BCP and that is what I wish it to stay as. Remember the days when barrows was one of the best and and mages used infinity with mage book and master wand? well I wish to recreate this, and so far I have done so with a modern twist of the new age such as edgeville as home and such. The base is Delta 317 of course but we all know that delta can be made into GREAT things. The client is fully coded by myself.
Spots open: Hoster: 0/1 Coder: 1/3 Advertiser(makes youtube vids): 0/3 Beta Tester: 0/4
Forums/site is in my Signature.
[code=text] Name: Age: Country: Spot interested in: Experience: Hrs Active per day/weekend/week: About you:[/code]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/1zn3i3s.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2af7gj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/244wc5z.jpg[/img]
if more pictures are needed then say so.

item.title: Project-Heartloss - A legend in the making
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“xShrawenx, post:6, topic:413184”]Name: Juuso
Age: 15
Country: Finland
Spot interested in: Admin / Advertiser (youtube) / Possible coder
Experience: RS 7 years, RSPS 4 years, actual coding one year, video making over two years.
Hrs Active per day/weekend/week: Monday - Friday 5hr+, Weekend 7hr+
About you: I know how to code, I have been looking for a good server for a long time, haven’t seen one so far until this. I have been coding my own server. I like coding RSPS and helping people in private servers. I know almost everything about RuneScape and i have very much experience :)[/quote]
Three month gravedig? Please, don’t gravedig anymore.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Projectfame wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:2, topic:413184”]I saw your updates today in the development section. Not bad for a new coder. I would be happy to beta test for you and possibly code.

Name: Nolan
Age: 16
Country: USA
Spot interested in: Beta Tester/ Possibly Coder
Experience: 2.5-3 years
Hrs Active per day/weekend/week: 3-4, and 5-6 on weekends
About you: I am a helpful trustworthy person. I am respectful to those around me and I treat everyone equally.[/quote]

accepted for Beta Coder report to the site and add my msn in my sig

[quote=“Daginith, post:1, topic:413197”]Name: Gavin (ingame:Daginith)
Age:15
Country: USA
Spot interested in: JAVA Server Programmer/Coder
Experience: 3 yrs.
Contace info: Daginith@gmail.com
Hrs Active per day/weekend/week: 2+ on school days 3-4+ on week ends.
About you: Im curently getting my C and Linux certifacations. i’ve been a web developer, and i kn MANY coding languages such as: PHP, HTML, CSS, JAVA, C/C++, some BASIC…also i had 2 RSPS of my own, built completely from scratch. if u want to kno anything else, just email me.[/quote]
hmm go to my site and post or talk on chat box to discuss more.

And just added a power Item shop, there are rings that you can equip and each one gives a different stat!
